name: ireporter
description: iReporter enables any/every citizen to bring any form of corruption to the notice of appropriate authorities and the general public. Users can also report on things that needs government intervention

scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=DEVELOPMENT&& nodemon --exec npm run babel-node -- dummyApi/server.js
scripts.start:dev: export NODE_ENV=PRODUCTION&& nodemon --exec npm run babel-node -- dummyApi/server.js
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=TEST&& nyc --reporter=text mocha  --timeout 100000 --compilers js:babel-register ./dummyApi/tests/*.js --exit --reporter spec
